summary: The diff implements most of the core requirements including splash screen, home with trending carousel, category sections, AI recommendations, continue watching, search with suggestions, watchlist functionality, kids mode, user authentication (Internet Identity), profile management, navigation, and dark cinematic UI. However, several key requirements are missing or incomplete, and there are no obvious hallucinated features beyond the specification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build a movie detail page that displays movie poster, trailer preview player, rating, cast list, description, and a watch button
missing_requirements.reason: The MovieDetail page component is referenced in routing (App.tsx) but the actual implementation file (frontend/src/pages/MovieDetail.tsx) is not included in the diff. Cannot verify if trailer preview player, cast list display, and watch button functionality are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build a Continue Watching section that tracks partially watched movies and displays them for easy resume
missing_requirements.reason: ContinueWatching.tsx displays movies with a progress indicator, but there is no backend logic or frontend tracking mechanism to actually track watch progress or resume from last position. The component just shows mock data without persistence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a categories page that allows users to browse all available movie categories
missing_requirements.reason: The Categories page is referenced in routing (App.tsx) but the actual implementation file (frontend/src/pages/Categories.tsx) is not included in the diff. Cannot verify if category browsing is implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Populate the app with sample movie data including titles, posters, ratings, cast, descriptions, trailers, and category classifications
missing_requirements.reason: The backend has an addMovie function but no sample data initialization code is present. The requirement specifies at least 20 sample movies with complete metadata distributed across categories, but there is no evidence of data seeding or initialization in the backend.
